xxl.core.indexStructures.vLengthBPlusTree
Class VariableLengthBPlusTree.Node.SplitInfo

java.lang.Object
  xxl.core.indexStructures.Tree.Node.SplitInfo
      xxl.core.indexStructures.vLengthBPlusTree.VariableLengthBPlusTree.Node.SplitInfo
Enclosing class:
VariableLengthBPlusTree.Node
public class VariableLengthBPlusTree.Node.SplitInfo
extends Tree.Node.SplitInfo

A SplitInfo contains information about a split. The enclosing object of this SplitInfo-Object (i.e. Node.this) is the new node which was created by the split.
